description: This file defines a client-side storage class 'Store' for managing a to-do list, including methods for finding, retrieving, saving, removing, and dropping data, with internal in-memory storage and support for callbacks.

classes.name: Store
classes.description: A class for managing client-side storage of to-do items, supporting CRUD operations and in-memory persistence.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes a new Store instance with a specified database name and optional callback.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds items matching a query object and executes a callback with the results.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all to-do items and executes a callback with the list.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves or updates a to-do item; generates a new ID if needed.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a to-do item by ID and executes a callback.

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Clears all stored to-do items and executes a callback.
